APLA_Database

APLA_Database.Rd

APLA Database is the original APLA Dataset

APLA_Database

Format

A data frame with 551 rows and 262 variables:

Q1

Country Coded

Q2

Year Coded

Q5#1_1

Is the country party to the UN Convention relating to Refugees? ('Party to' means ratified) [Yes(1),No(0)]

Q5#2_1

Is the country party to the UN Convention relating to Refugees? ('Party to' means ratified) [Restrictive(0), Liberal(1)]

Q5#3_1_1

Source of Question Q5

Q5#4_1_1

Comments on Question Q5

LA7#1_1

Has the country incorporated into its national law the principles of the 1984 Cartagena Declaration on the scope of the refugee definition, or a variation thereof? [Such declaration defines refugees as: persons who have fled their country because their lives, safety or freedom have been threatened by generalized violence, foreign aggression, internal conflicts, massive violation of human rights or other circumstances which have seriously disturbed public order].[Yes(1),No(0)]

LA7#2_1

Has the country incorporated into its national law the principles of the 1984 Cartagena Declaration on the scope of the refugee definition, or a variation thereof? [Such declaration defines refugees as: persons who have fled their country because their lives, safety or freedom have been threatened by generalized violence, foreign aggression, internal conflicts, massive violation of human rights or other circumstances which have seriously disturbed public order]. [Restrictive(0), Liberal(1)]

LA7#3_1_1

Source of Question LA7

LA7#4_1_1
